as an aptitude user, I facepalmed a lot, yes.
And what drove the "dropping aptitude" call?
If there's no MX record, A is used instead.
As well as, in this case [THC]AcidRain has an MX record that points to GoDaddy.
And there are some busted mailservers out there that don't honor A records; they choke on a lack of MX.
Not common, but email is a study in edge and corner cases.
